column5: Well when I first released my black/white logo I wanted to release this one first or at the same time but I could not get it to save as it is a huge file yesterday my sticker guy helpped me out and I now have it on my computer. Here is the new colour logo hope ya all like it.
Looks great Mike!!!!!!!
sweet!
awesome!!!
Like it I love it if u haven't already pm me with prices that will be my birthday present, I would like one for my wife and son also.  They will stand out up here

You know what they say, if you don't have anything nice to say don't say anything. Well now I'm going to comment on your logo Mike P, now that I see it in color that is a great logo. That is a Musky for sure.  You picked the right artist, he or she caught the caricature of a fish which isn't easy. You now have to start the process of having that image protected by a copyright. I don't think it will cost you huge however regardless of price you want to get the image protected. Wouldn't it be a shame if you turned on the fishing Chanel and see that image stolen by another retailer. Hopefully your artist doesn't have the rights to it.
if that is what is going on your tshirts, i need a few.
Looks Fantastic Mike, Make mine 2 for the Oddessy XL See you there for sure

Thanks guys I to love this logo.  Sorry but no colour shirts  As for copy write I waited to respond here until I found out and yes it has his own copy write on it and I have full rights to use it from the artist. All is good there thanks again for the good words all
Looks fantastic Mike!!
Awesome!
Nice!
Thanks guys

Looks good, but, typographycally  the space between the bullets (round dots Is not equal from the left and right side, I'd get adjusted  if possible, but not a big deal, I have an eye for logos.  Yes, do get it registered, a TM can be kept for a while but registered is for ever. I don't have the figures on hand.
I'm a little off so it look perfect to me
Logo looks great Mike! Will you have some stickers available at the Odyssey next weekend - I would love to slap a big one of those on the side of my boat!  Pete
That logo is awesome man! Congrats on taking your hobby to these heights! Cant wait to see some long sleeve tees and hoodies:)  Well done.
That is very cool!!!!!!!!

Thanks guys for the odyssey we will just have the black/white shirts and stickers. I wanted to get the colour ones but it looks like they will not be done in time. The shirts are short sleeve only but are the high quality guilden ultra ones not cheap thin crappy ones these will last. Like my lures I want to have a better product.
Mike, I'll take a XXL in black  Cheers !
cant wait to be rockin a couple of those stickers on my jeep, they look awesome mike.  hopefully grab a white t at the odyssey too if i can make it between exams!
Got ya down Chris
